category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA122_download_dlg_silent_mode
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to suppress the document selector dialog for download operations. Possible values: 0 - the dialog is never suppressed (Default) 1 - the dialog is suppressed if all the conflicts are automatically resolved according to the current configuration of preferences TCAA122_download_dlg_conflicting_*_selection_mode
